about.storyText:
Nata-Nord Tallinn started in 2025, inspired by a love for baking and a desire to bring the taste of Portugal to Estonia. Founded by a Portuguese native living in Tallinn, it all began with a simple idea: to share the traditional pastel de nata with the local community.

What began as a small kitchen project quickly grew as more people discovered and loved our pastries. Using a family recipe and fresh ingredients, we bake every nata with care and pride.

Today, Nata-Nord is a little slice of Portugal in the heart of Tallinn ‚Äî sharing warm, flaky natas and a passion for good food.
about.visionText:
At Nata-Nord Tallinn, we want to share the true taste of Portugal with everyone in Tallinn. We bake fresh, tasty past√©is de nata with care and use the best ingredients.

Our goal is to bring joy and good moments through our pastries and make everyone feel welcome.
about.orderText: Experience our collection of fresh Pasteis de Nata, available for order online.
about.tiagoDesc: Passionate Portuguese baker in traditional pastry making.
about.sonjaDesc: Estonian native with a love for pastries and customer service.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectionText: We collect personal information such as your name, email, phone number, and delivery address when you place an order.
privacyPolicy.dataUseText: Your information is used to process orders, communicate with you, and improve our services. We do not share your data with third parties except for delivery purposes.
privacyPolicy.dataProtectionText: We implement security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access or disclosure.
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: Our website uses cookies to enhance your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.
privacyPolicy.contactText: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at privacy@nata-nord.ee.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: These terms govern your use of Nata-Nord Tallinn's services. By using our site, you agree to these terms.
termsOfService.ordersText: Orders can be placed online. We reserve the right to cancel or refuse any order.
termsOfService.paymentText: Payments must be completed before delivery. We accept all major payment methods.
termsOfService.deliveryText: Delivery times are estimates and may vary. We are not responsible for delays caused by third parties.
termsOfService.refundsText: Please contact us if you have issues with your order. Refunds or replacements are handled on a case-by-case basis.
termsOfService.userConductText: You agree not to misuse our services or engage in harmful behavior.
termsOfService.changesText: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use means you accept the changes.
termsOfService.contactText: For questions regarding these terms, contact natanord.tallinn@gmail.com
